achievements: Won an Academy Award for Best Original Screenplay for The Producers (1967)
Directed and produced numerous iconic comedy films like Blazing Saddles, Young Frankenstein, and Spaceballs
A recipient of the Kennedy Center Honors and Presidential Medal of Freedom
Op-Ed columnist for The New York Times
Author of several best-selling books on social and political issues, including 'The Road to Character'
Frequent commentator on current affairs and public policy
